about_the_game:
SUPPORTER PACK


Greetings, Fountain Seekers! Embark on a journey of support with our exclusive Supporter Pack! It includes special items designed specifically for you who choose to go the extra mile in supporting us. We’d like to express our gratitude to everyone who decides to purchase it, your generosity is truly appreciated.

Inside the 'Supporter Pack' you will find the following digital items:

The Amigo

The in-game recipe for Amigo, an ancient leather ball and an eternal source of psychological support for shipwreck survivors. It bounces off surfaces, glows in the dark, keeps insects away, and gives you a 5% bonus to sleep quality. 
Feel extra lonely? You can craft several of them!

Survival: Fountain of Youth soundtrack

A playlist taken directly from a 16th-century adventurer to relax/study/work/survive.
Immerse yourself in eleven ambient tracks that will take you on an atmospheric journey in the pursuit of eternal youth - wherever you are.

Please be assured that your generosity resonates deeply with us.
Purchase the Supporter Pack and enhance your Fountain of Youth adventure!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains spiders, snakes, and scorpions.
If you have phobias related to these or similar creatures, please be aware that they appear in Survival: Fountain of Youth.
